Create New Pristine Seas Expedition Structure

Source: R/create_expedition.R
create_expedition.Rd

Creates a comprehensive standardized folder structure for Pristine Seas expeditions in the expeditions folder of the science drive. Expedition names follow the convention ISO3-YEAR (e.g., CHL-2024).

Usage

create_expedition(expedition_name, create_readme = TRUE)

Arguments

expedition_name

Character string. Name of the expedition following ISO3-YEAR format

create_readme

Logical. Whether to create a README.md file with expedition template (default: TRUE)

Value

Character string. Path to the created expedition folder

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# Create an expedition (standard naming: ISO3-YEAR)
create_expedition("CHL-2024")

# Create expedition without README
create_expedition("MEX-2024", create_readme = FALSE)
} # }
